title: Level Up Complete?
description: An interactive exercise for practicing verb tenses based on the story of Alex and Maya discovering their reality is a game.
storyText:
Alex [VERB:wake up:1] feeling strangely disconnected. They [VERB:have always felt:1] like something wasn't quite right, but today was different. Yesterday, during a particularly stressful meeting, the world [VERB:flicker:1] for a split second. "Did that really happen?" Alex [VERB:wonder:1]. Their friend, Maya, [VERB:call:1] them now; “Hey, you seem distracted. Everything okay?” Alex hesitated.

“I think… I think our lives are a game,” Alex finally [VERB:say:2]. Maya [VERB:laugh:2]. "Don't be silly! You [VERB:play:2] too much 'Reality Shift' last night!" Suddenly, a notification [VERB:appear:2] in Alex’s vision: “Warning: System Anomaly Detected. Player Awareness Level Rising.” Before Alex [VERB:can react:2], the notification vanished. “Oh my god,” Maya breathed, “I see it too!”

“If this [VERB:be:3] a game,” Alex [VERB:declare:3], “then we need a strategy. We [VERB:make:3] so many choices, good and bad. Before this realization, I [VERB:have not consider:3] the consequences could be… programmed!” They decided to focus on completing "quests" - achieving life goals. “I [VERB:will finish:3] my novel, and you [VERB:will travel:3] to Japan like you always wanted,"Alex stated.

Years [VERB:will have pass:4] by the time Alex finishes the novel, but they feel closer to understanding the purpose of the ‘game’. They [VERB:believe:4] that by achieving their goals, they [VERB:will unlock:4] the final level – a glimpse behind the code of reality. "Maybe it’s not about 'winning'," Maya said thoughtfully, "Maybe it's about how we [VERB:play:4] the game." Alex smiled. The final quest [VERB:be start:4] now.
